properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 8 at 8:49PM CST until February 9 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 45 mph on Sunday leading
to areas of blowing and drifting snow.

* WHERE...Murray and Cottonwood Counties.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Significant amounts of snow are forecast that will
make travel dangerous...and visibilities will be limited
further due to strong winds blowing snow around.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST SUNDAY
